translations: n.泡菜，腌菜；菜酱，泡菜汁；<美>腌黄瓜；<非正式>困境；<英，非正式，旧>捣蛋鬼，讨厌鬼；（用来清洗金属物体的）淡酸水

sentences.sentence: Select your favourite fruit or veg and pickle them while they are still fresh.
sentences.translation: 挑选你最喜欢的水果或蔬菜，趁新鲜腌制起来。

sentences.sentence: Pickle juice has long been touted as a fix for cramping muscles, and now a recent study lends even more credibility to this home remedy.
sentences.translation: 泡菜汁一直被吹捧可以修复肌肉抽筋，现在一项最新的研究为这个家庭治疗提供更多的可信度。
